name: Dark Snow (itch)
description:
GO FULL SCREEN FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE!!!!

--------------------------------------------------------

Game submitted to the Black and White game-jam

https://itch.io/jam/black-and-white-jam-7

--------------------------------------------------------

You are a snowman, trapped in a cursed pit. The Dark Snow is everywhere. It gives you power, but it corrupts your souls. Your life is in an endless cycle, you can't die. The only way to die is by melting into the sun. But the pit is dark, and the only way to escape is to collect the power of the Dark Snow, and to climb the pit. The road will be difficult. Most of the creatures that live into the pit tried the climb, but failed to the dark snow corruption: they won't let you go easily. Will you be able to defeat all your enemies, and resist the power of the dark snow, to finally melt and rest in peace?

--------------------------------------------------------

Game features:

-3D black and white graphics, with real-time lighting

- 20 to 30 minutes gameplay

- Melee combat based on physics, with parry and counter style

- Explore a map with no loading screens, and unlock new powers to get into new areas

- Collect the Dark Snow to increase your power and your health. If you die, you lose your snow on the field. You can get it again, but if you die it's gone forever

- 4 different enemies, with increasing power

- 2 boss battles

- 2 endings

-----------------------------------------------------------

Commands:

-A,D or left analog: move

-Spacebar or A: jump

-Left mouse or RT: attack

-Right mouse or LT: parry (perfect timing for perfect parry)

-CTRL or B: dash

-E or Y: Interact

- P or Start: Pause
